ftbquests.chapter.botania.title: Mana Manifest[--魔力特典--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests0.title: Mana generating flower[--魔力生成花--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests0.descri: Mana is made using special &bMana-generating Flowers&r. The first and easiest is the &6Kekimaru&r, the cake eating flower.[--魔力是使用特殊的&b魔力产能花&r制成的。第一种也是最简单的是&6Kekimaru&r,吃蛋糕的花。--]
Each makes Mana using a different method; see the &6Lexica Botania&r for details on each.[--每个方块使用不同的方法来制作魔力;每个方块的详情请查看&6植物魔法魔法&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests1.title: Flower Power[--花之力量--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests1.subtit: That'll be just dandylion[--这将只是dandylion--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests1.descri: You can get &bFlowers&r by using Bone Meal on Grass. Using Bone Meal directly on a flower will &6duplicate it&r.[--你可以通过在草方块上使用骨粉来得到&b花&r.直接在花上使用骨粉&6复制它&r.--]
Once you've gotten a few, it would be a good idea to craft them into &6Floral Fertilizer&r.[--一旦你得到一些,最好把它们合成成&6花肥&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests2.title: Sky of Beginnings[--开始之空--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests2.descri: Once you've gotten &bMystical Flowers&r, either from Floral Fertilizer or by chance, you can start working with Mana.[--一旦你得到&b神秘花&r,通过花肥或几率,你就可以开始使用魔力了.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests3.subtit: The seeds of growth[--生长之种--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests3.descri: Magical flowers are created in the &bPetal Apothecary&r. Fill it with water, throw in the ingredients, then throw in Seeds.[--魔法花可以在&b花药台&r中制作.填满水,扔入原料,然后扔入种子.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests4.descri: The &bPure Daisy&r is the first &6Functional Flower&r you'll make.[--&bPureDaisy&r是你的第一个&6功能花&r.--]
When placed, it will slowly &6convert nearby blocks into other blocks&r.[--放置时,它会缓慢&6将附近的方块转换成其他方块&r.--]
Most notably, it is used to create &6Livingrock&r and &6Livingwood&r, two massively important blocks.[--最值得注意的是,它用于制造&6活石&r和&6活木&r,两个非常重要的方块.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests5.subtit: Mana Storage and Transfer[--魔力存储和传输--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests5.descri: &bMana Spreaders&r move Mana, and &bMana Pools&r store it. A Spreader will use an adjacent Pool's Mana if it has none.[--&b魔力发射器&r移动魔力,&b魔力池&r会储存它.如果它没有魔力池,魔力池会使用相邻的魔力池.--]

If a Spreader is &6bound to a block that can hold Mana&r (and the Spreader &ohas&r Mana), the Spreader will &6shoot a Mana Burst at it&r.[--如果魔力发射器&6绑定到可以容纳魔力的方块&r(和魔力发射器&ohas&r魔力),魔力发射器将&6射出魔力脉冲&r.--]
Generating flora will push mana to their bound Spreader.[--产能花会将魔力推向绑定的魔力发射器。--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests6.title: Wand of the Forest[--森林法杖--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests6.descri: The &bWand of the Forest&r is essentially Botania's wrench. Its main use is to &6bind blocks to other blocks&r.[--&b森林法杖&r基本上是植物魔法的扳手。它主要用于&6将方块绑定到其他方块上&r.--]
While in Bind Mode (swap by sneak right-clicking), sneak right-click a block, then sneak right-click the block you want to bind it to.[--在绑定模式下(潜行右键以抽取),潜行右键单击一个方块,然后潜行右键单击你想绑定的方块。--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests7.subtit: Understanding, Deconstructing, and Reconstructing[--理解、解构和再构--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests7.descri: The &bAlchemy Catalyst&r is placed under the Mana Pool, and &6adds some recipes for throwing items in&r.[--&b炼金催化剂&r被放置在魔力池下,&6添加一些将物品扔进&r的配方.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests8.descri: The &bRunic Altar&r is used to craft items together using Mana.[--&b符文祭坛&r用于使用魔力一起制作物品.--]
Throw the ingredients on, and give it Mana from a Spreader to start.[--将原料扔上,然后从发射器中给它魔力来开始.--]
Once it's done, &6throw Livingstone on top&r and use a Wand of the Forest on it.[--完成后,&6将活石扔到顶部&r并在上面使用森林法杖.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests9.descri: The &bTerrestrial Agglomeration Plate&r is used to craft &6Terrasteel&r. It is part of a multiblock; see the &6Lexica Botania&r for construction details.[--&b泰拉凝聚板&r用于制作&6泰拉钢&r.它是多方块结构的一部分;有关建造细节,请查看&6植物魔法魔法魔法&r.--]
Rather than being powered by a Mana Spreader, you must use &6Sparks&r.[--与魔力发射器不同,你必须使用&6火花&r.--]
Attach a Spark to the Plate, and another to a nearby Mana Pool. When needed, the Plate will pull Mana through the Spark.[--将火花添加到火花板上,另一个添加到附近的魔力池上。当需要时,魔力池会从火花中拉出魔力。--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests10.title: The Portal to Alfheim[--通往亚尔夫海姆的传送门--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests10.descr: The &bPortal to Alfheim&r is a multiblock structure, powered by Mana, that allows you to &6trade an item for another&r by throwing it through.[--&b精灵之门&r是一个多方块结构,由魔力供能,允许你通过扔出去&6交易一个物品&r.--]
See the &6Lexica Botania&r for construction details.[--查看&6植物魔法Lexica Botania&r了解建造细节.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests11.title: The Ritual of Gaia[--盖亚仪式--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests11.descr: The &bRitual of Gaia&r allows you to &6summon and fight the Gaia Guardian&r, a powerful boss.[--&b盖亚仪式&r允许你&6召唤盖亚守护者&r,一个强大的Boss.--]
To do so, build the stage (see the book) and use a &bTerrasteel Ingot&r on the Beacon at the center.[--要这样做,请建造一个阶段(查看这本书),在中心信标上使用&b泰拉钢锭&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests12.title: Integrated Magic[--集成魔法--]
